content: अमंत्र, --त्रक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not accompanied by Vedic verses, not requiring the repetition of Vedic texts, as a ceremony &c.; <ls>Ms. 3. 121</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">2. 66.</ls> {@--2@} Not entitled to Vedic verses, such as a Śūdra, a female &c.; <ls>Ms. 9. 18.</ls> {@--3@} Not knowing Vedic texts; अव्रतानाममंत्राणां <ls n="Ms.">12. 114.</ls> {@--4@} Not accompanied by the use of spells or incantations, as a cure &c.; अनया कथमन्यथावलीढा न हि जीवंति जना मनागमंत्राः <ls>Bv. 1. 111.</ls>
